view[source]

view(obj, depth=1, indent=' ', width=100, seq_length=1000, show_protected=False, show_private=True, show_static=True, show_properties=True, show_address=False, str_length=1000)

Print everything that belongs to an object

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

bytes_encode[source]

bytes_encode(bites)

Encode bytes to base64 string

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

bytes_decode[source]

bytes_decode(encoded)

Decode base64 string to bytes

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

timer_start[source]

timer_start(label='timer')

Start for timer. Place above start of code you want to time

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

timer_stop[source]

timer_stop(start, label='timer')

End for timer. Place below end of code you want to time. Prints execution time of surrounded code

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
start=timer_start()
time.sleep(5)
timer_stop(start)

[END] TIMER 5.01 secs
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

to_bytesio[source]

to_bytesio(bites)

Convert bytes to io.BytesIO

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cprint[source]

cprint(s1, s2=None, c1='\x1b[36m', c2='\x1b[36m', c0='\x1b[36m')

Print in color of c1

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

untar[source]

untar(tf, path='.')

untar tarfile

{% endraw %}
